Name: Palorma
Review Text: The pizza here was very good. Service was fine, food came on time, not too expensive. My friends didn't think the pasta was fantastic, but it wasn't terrible. Atmosphere was alright, a bit dark, but still "gezellig". Nice place! ;)

Name: Palorma
Review Text: Quality food in a lovely setting, nice to watch the pizzas get made too!

Name: Palorma
Review Text: Good service and delicious pizza for a great value.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: What a delightful little Pizzeria.  Dropped in at random and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food.  I had steak with a mushroom sauce and my wife had pizza, both were lovely.  Coffee and Armagnac to finish and all at a very reasonable price.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: Been there with our staff and family. Everyone enjoyed the meal. We ordered different kinds of pizza (Spinach, Shoarma, spicy chicken) definitely recommended. Very friendly people. Just make sure you make a call before going inside.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: These folks were the nicest despite the fact that me and my partner always seemed to come by at closing to ask for take away. Their pizza is amazing, and I say this as someone who lives and eats pizza in NYC. The cheese, sauce, and dough are all amazing.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: The food is delicious, the chef is a professional and the staff is super friendly.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: Always friendly service and lots of variety of Italian foods from pizza pasta and meat dishes. Outdoor seating available during warm weather. Nice place for groups too. Near artis zoo so it's a good place for dinner after a day at the zoo. Close to another pizza place two doors down but this palorma is better. Room to park bike outside

Name: Palorma
Review Text: An ok pizzeria, friendly staff and a clean facility. None of the pizzas were great or exceptional, the ingredients would’ve needed more quality and/or a wood-stove to lift the rating higher.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: With delicious pizza, chatty staff and good prices I found this place to be good pizza restaurant and somewhere I would return to. They also do take out which is great for the summer months as it's near the canal.

Name: Palorma
Review Text: Great service. Delicious food. Super value for money. Great ambience. Loved the amaretto as we were paying. Lovely touch. Thank you.
